goal_templates: Fetch all solutions offered by support representative [Employee ID] to a customer [Customer ID]

Check if support representative [Employee ID] proposed a refund for [Product ID or Product Name] to customer [Customer ID or Customer Name]

Obtain the outcomes (e.g., replacement, advice) for all support interactions managed by [Employee ID].
